import requests

 

url = 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1528459199957-0ff28496a7f6?ixid=MnwxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8&ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1943&q=80'
filename = "./file.jpeg"
response = requests.get(url)
with open(filename, "wb") as f:
    f.write(response.content)
source.9850de2e:
import easyocr
reader = easyocr.Reader(['en'])
result = reader.readtext(filename)
final_text =""
for _, text, __ in result: # _ = bounding box, text = text and __ = confident level
    final_text += " " 
    final_text += text
final_text

import cv2
import pytesseract
img = filename
text = pytesseract.image_to_string(img)
print("-", text, "-")
